Interface ShowtimeRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Showtime,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Showtime,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Showtime,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Showtime,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Showtime,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Showtime>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Showtime,Long>
@Repository public interface ShowtimeRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Showtime,Long>
Repository interface for managing Showtime entities. Extends JpaRepository to provide standard CRUD operations and defines custom queries for finding showtimes related to movies, halls, and detecting scheduling overlaps.

  • Method Details

    • findByMovieMovieId

      List<Showtime> findByMovieMovieId(Long movieId)
      Retrieves a list of showtimes for a specific movie.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie
      Returns:
      list of showtimes associated with the movie

    • findByMovieMovieIdOrderByStartTimeDesc

      List<Showtime> findByMovieMovieIdOrderByStartTimeDesc(Long movieId)
      Retrieves a list of showtimes for a specific movie, ordered by start time in descending order.
      Parameters:
      movieId - the ID of the movie
      Returns:
      list of showtimes ordered by start time (newest first)

    • findOverlappingShowtimes

      @Query("SELECT s FROM Showtime s WHERE :hall = s.hall AND :newStart < s.endTime AND :newEnd > s.startTime") List<Showtime> findOverlappingShowtimes(@Param("hall") Hall hall, @Param("newStart") LocalDateTime newStart, @Param("newEnd") LocalDateTime newEnd)
      Finds any showtimes in the given hall that overlap with a specified time interval.

      This query is typically used when creating a new showtime to ensure that the new showtime does not conflict with existing showtimes in the same hall.

      Parameters:
      hall - the Hall to check for overlapping showtimes
      newStart - the proposed new showtime start time
      newEnd - the proposed new showtime end time
      Returns:
      list of showtimes that overlap with the given time range in the hall

    • findOverlappingShowtimesForUpdate

      @Query("SELECT s FROM Showtime s WHERE :hall = s.hall AND s.showtimeId != :excludeId AND :newStart < s.endTime AND :newEnd > s.startTime") List<Showtime> findOverlappingShowtimesForUpdate(@Param("hall") Hall hall, @Param("newStart") LocalDateTime newStart, @Param("newEnd") LocalDateTime newEnd, @Param("excludeId") Long excludeId)
      Finds any showtimes in the given hall that overlap with a specified time interval, excluding a particular showtime by its ID.

      This query is useful during showtime updates, to ensure that the updated showtime's new schedule does not overlap with other showtimes, excluding itself.

      Parameters:
      hall - the Hall to check for overlapping showtimes
      newStart - the proposed updated showtime start time
      newEnd - the proposed updated showtime end time
      excludeId - the ID of the showtime to exclude from the check (usually the one being updated)
      Returns:
      list of overlapping showtimes excluding the specified showtime
